remarks: A locally compact space is compactly generated.  (This variant of ~ llycmpkgen uses the weaker definition of locally compact, "every point has a compact neighborhood", instead of "every point has a local base of compact neighborhoods".)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
iskgen3.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
llycmpkgen2.2 $e |- ( ph -> J e. Top ) $.
llycmpkgen2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> E. k e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { x } ) ( J |`t k ) e. Comp ) $.
llycmpkgen2 $p |- ( ph -> J e. ran kGen ) $.
$d J k x $.
$d X k $.
$d k ph x $.
